name: Transcendence
description: Transcendence is a peer-led support group for transgender, non-binary, intersex, and gender-expansive folx. A space for connection, affirmation, and community care. This group is Hybrid (in person and online). It meets the First & Third Wednesday 4:30pm – 5:30pm.
fullDescription: Transcendence is a peer-led support group for transgender, non-binary, intersex, and gender-expansive folx. A space for connection, affirmation, and community care. This group is Hybrid (in person and online). It meets the First & Third Wednesday 4:30pm – 5:30pm.
whatTheyOffer: Transcendence is a peer-led support group for transgender, non-binary, intersex, and gender-expansive folx. A space for connection, affirmation, and community care. This group is Hybrid (in person and online). It meets the First & Third Wednesday 4:30pm – 5:30pm.
address: 870 Market Street, Suite 658, San Francisco, CA, 94102
agency: Mental Health Association of San Francisco (MHASF)
